title:
Will the larger bamboo plants grow in Wilmington and is there anywhere around here that sells it? 

Thanks
text:
Here's a link we could find about larger bamboo plants.
http://davesgarden.com/community/forums/t/642968/



We also recommend you contact the county arboretum at (910) 798-7660
for more tips on where you can find it. Good luck!
